item.title: • Set Photo Download Resolution
item.description:
Defines photo size downloaded during screensaver playback. If you have a slow internet connection, it's recommended to decrease this setting.
You will only see options your Roku player supports.

item.title: • Set Slideshow Display Method
item.description: Determines how the screensaver displays your photos.

item.title: • Set Slideshow Delay
item.description: Defines the number of seconds between photos while screensaver is active.

item.title: • Set Slideshow Order
item.description: Defines the order of the photos displayed during screensaver playback.

item.title: • Set Video Playback Options
item.description: Unfortunately Roku does not allow videos to be played back in the screensaver, yet!

item.title: • Select Linked User and Albums
item.description: Defines which account to pull photos from during screensaver playback. Displayed albums can be resitrcted per user, see below. To link additional users to device, launch channel and register.

item.title: • Set HDMI-CEC Control
item.description: Should only be disabled by advanced users experiencing HDMI-CEC control issues with the screensaver.

item.title: About Channel
item.description:
The 'PhotoView for Google Photos' channel was developed by Chris Taylor. It's dedicated to his 3-year-old daughter, who goes nuts every time she sees herself on TV.
We're committed to making this one of the best Photo Apps on the Roku platform.
If you have any questions or comments, please see [Tips and Tricks > Bugs / Feature Request]
Please remember to rate us, this helps spread the word and drive development!
https://www.photoviewapp.com/about-us
